PRICING

ALL-IN

CORPORATE | SOCIAL | TECH & VIRTUAL EVENTS

INQUIRE FOR SUBSCRIPTION PRICING

Planning your own dream experience can be overwhelming with family and friends telling you what you should want, but we’re here to give you what you actually want. The “All-In” subscription plan provides every client access to a full-planning representation from our rockstar event planners. Don’t need a full-service journey? Clients are welcome to choose as many months as they need for their event plans.

Think of having someone having your back for a full-planning journey. From allocating your destination, booking service, and design vendors, creating the vision towards your timeless day and manifesting it all-to-life. Bring the star planners to begin and complete your event journey with you.

MAIN STAGE

CORPORATE | SOCIAL | TECH & VIRTUAL EVENTS

$1,800.00 - DAY OF PRODUCTION

Bringing your magical day to life is our greatest purpose here at ROCKNEVENTS. Whilst our competition charges over $2k for a day of service, we aim closer to the mission of bringing a quality experience. The “Main Stage” for a one-time fee of $1,800 provides the necessary day of production perfect for anyone.

You’re finally at the finish line of your event, and now it’s the moment to bring about all your logistical and creative details. Now that we’re just about complete, allow your personal experiential team to build your production.

ROCKX RENTALS

INQUIRE FOR SUBSCRIPTION PRICING

At ROCKX RENTALS, our rentals are timeless, classy, and oh-so-sexy. From ceiling treatments to luxury candling and lighting, ROCKX RENTALS offers top-of-the-line decorations and supplies that bring an extra dose of elegance, allure, and beauty to any event. Check out our 2021 Catalog and galleries below for more details.

EVENT CONSULTING

$300.00 A MONTH

If you’re not in production mode, don’t stress! You can subscribe with TEAM RNE consultants to plan your next best party with an experiential advisor by your side. Our remote consulting services will guide you into the right plans to connect you with the most reputable vendors while you independently plan for your best day ever!
